DOC.criteria: 1 . Nulliparous woman 18 year older admit labor delivery unit active labor ( 3cm dilatation contraction ) . 2 . Parturients epidural anesthesia 3 . Singleton fetus vertex presentation 4 . Gestational age 37 5 . Reassuring fetal heart trace 6 . The woman able read understand consent form 1 . Parturients natural birth without epidural anesthesia 2 . Low lie placenta 3 . Known suspected fetal maternal infection 4 . Maternal thrombocytopenia 5 . Maternal bleeding disorder 6 . Known major fetal malformation 7 . Suspected fetal growth restriction 8 . Subjects significant psychiatric history 9 . Subjects indication immediate delivery 10 .
